external_references.source_name: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011
external_references.description: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien 2011, February W32.Stuxnet Dossier (Version 1.4) Retrieved November 17, 2024.

objects.description: [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0603) checks for specific operating systems on 32-bit machines, Registry keys, and dates for vulnerabilities, and will exit execution if the values are not met.(Citation: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011)
